/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/:
The image captures a bustling city street, bathed in the soft glow of daylight. The sky above is a serene blue, dotted with fluffy white clouds. The street below is a hive of activity, with several cars and buses navigating their way through the thoroughfare. 

On either side of the street, buildings rise up, their facades a mix of modern and traditional architectural styles. The buildings on the left side of the street are predominantly white and gray, their sleek lines reflecting the sunlight. In contrast, the buildings on the right side are painted in shades of brown and beige, their earthy tones adding a touch of warmth to the scene.

The street itself is lined with lush green trees and bushes, their leaves rustling gently in the breeze. Street lamps stand sentinel along the sidewalk, their presence hinting at the transformation of the scene as day turns into night.

The image is taken from a high vantage point, offering a bird's eye view of the street below. This perspective allows for a comprehensive view of the cityscape, capturing the essence of urban life in one frame. The image is a testament to the city's vibrancy and dynamism, encapsulating a moment in the life of a bustling metropolis.
